name: HoverEffect
desc: An effect applied when the pointer hovers over a view.

items.name: static let automatic: HoverEffect
items.desc: An effect that attempts to determine the effect automatically. This is the default effect.

items.name: static let highlight: HoverEffect
items.desc: An effect that morphs the pointer into a platter behind the view and shows a light source indicating position.

items.name: static let lift: HoverEffect
items.desc: An effect that slides the pointer under the view and disappears as the view scales up and gains a shadow.
